newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 33.631 (33.634).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 33.631 (33.634).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 33.631 to the dollar after Tuesday's fixing at 33.634, and at 19.265 to the mark from 19.257.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at 1130 CET.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of -0.25 percent, after a deviation of -0.23 percent on Tuesday.
At the time of the calculation, the crown was trading on the interbank market at -0.12 percent versus the basket.
